problem: 问题11. 已知 $\sum_{i=1}^n x_i=1$, 求证: $\sum_{i=1}^n \sqrt{\frac{1}{x_i}-1} \geqslant(n-1) \cdot \sum_{i=1}^n \frac{1}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{x_i}-1}}$.
solution: 证明:局部不等式: $x_i \cdot \sqrt{\frac{1-x_j}{x_j}}+x_j \cdot \sqrt{\frac{1-x_i}{x_i}} \geqslant\left(1-x_i\right) \sqrt{\frac{x_j}{1-x_j}}+ \left(1-x_j\right) \sqrt{\frac{x_i}{1-x_i}}$. 进而易证原不等式成立.
